Name: barrierMode
Desc:
Input 0 or 1 to modify barrier behavior
during Graze.
Modes:
- Default (0): Barriers can activate and consume
MP in all calculated damage scenarios
including Graze, Hit, and Defend
- OG FMW (1): Barriers only activate and consume
MP on Hit and Defend




The projected barrier sprite in the Battle Info
screen only appears when the unit's barrier can
successfully nullify/reduce damage,
with the projection assuming the unit is unfocused.
When selecting the OG FMW option,
be wary when barriers do not activate during Graze
